column4: someone teach me how to transfer files from my Windows computer to my Linux computer via SSH
for example, Let's say that I have a file located at C:\Users\Awesome\My Documents\xx.png
How would I transfer that via scp
to my xubuntu box? at its document folder?
not for file transfers as far as I know
you could also download pscp from http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/download.html and use the command pscp c:\path\to\file user@ip.to.ssh.serv:/path/to save
winscp just gives you a nice gui frontend to do the exact same thing.
did you give it root credentials?
it still must respect linux filesystem attributes.
